Package com.jmex.physics

jME Physics 2

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PhysicsUpdateCallback This class provides a callback for extending the behaviour of the physics.
 

Class Summary
DynamicPhysicsNode This PhysicsNode represents a physical entity that can be subject to forces to move and/or rotate it.
Joint A Joint constraints the relative location and rotation of two PhysicsNodes.
JointAxis An axis for a Joint.
PhysicsCollisionGeometry Subclasses of this class are used to specify the physical geometry of a PhysicsNode.
PhysicsDebugger Analoguous to Debugger this class can be used to view physics data such as physics collision bounds, velocity and forces.
PhysicsNode A PhysicsNode defines a physical entity.
PhysicsSpace PhysicsSpace is the central class of the jME Physics API.
RotationalJointAxis A rotational axis for a Joint.
StaticPhysicsNode This PhysicsNode represents a physical entity that cannot be moved or rotated by forces.
TranslationalJointAxis A translational axis for a Joint.
 

Package com.jmex.physics Description

jME Physics 2
